titles.title: A bill to amend title 31, United States Code, to clarify the use of credentials by enrolled agents.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/5/2014--Introduced. Permits any enrolled agent properly licensed to represent taxpayers before the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) to use the credentials or designation of "enrolled agent," "EA," or "E.A."
